posts.post_title: t205 kid elberfeld PSA 5 was $90 now only $75 shipped!!!!
posts.post_content:
Scans available... Good deal

Now $75 shipped!!!!

Hi, 
Gotta love the Kid... could you please send scans of this to me at:
[url]RicksRookies@yahoo.com[/url]
Thanks much, 
Rick.

Hi Edward,

Got your message with the pictures.  Thanks, taking a closer look at the scans now,

Rick.

Hi Edward,

Got your email back.  I'll take it, this will be a great addition to my collection.  I appreciate it and i will paypal you payment now,

Rick.

Hi Edward,

My new T205 Kid Elberfeld has safely arrived!  Just wanted to let you know (and give you well-deserved positive feedback here) and say thanks for a smooth transaction.  Appreciate it and i'll definitely look into your future items!

Rick.
